GlossaryTerm.TermName: stage II transitional cell cancer of the renal pelvis and ureter
GlossaryTerm.TermPronunciation: (... tran-ZIH-shuh-nul sel KAN-ser ... REE-nul PEL-vus ... YER-eh-ter)

TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cancer has spread to the muscle layer of the renal pelvis or ureter.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "stage II transitional cell cancer of the renal pelvis and ureter"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "cáncer de células de transición de pelvis renal y uréter en estadio II"

GlossaryTerm.SpanishTermName: cáncer de células de transición de pelvis renal y uréter en estadio II

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: El cáncer se diseminó a la capa muscular de la pelvis renal o el uréter.

RelatedInformation.RelatedSummaryRef: Transitional Cell Cancer of the Renal Pelvis and Ureter Treatment
Tratamiento del cáncer de células de transición de pelvis renal y de uréter
